Definition: Text or graphics that label information about features
Background map that provides geographical context for other data layers
Elevation data, often provided as a point cloud or DEM
Coordinate-based (vector) data represented as lines or polylines
Unstructured grid of vertices, edges, and faces, often with a temporal component
Photos taken from the air or other elevated point at an angle of around 45 degrees
Structured grid containing 1+ bands of decimal or integer data
Photos taken at an angle parallel to the ground surface (i.e. most photos taken while standing on the ground)
